```{r}
# Install and load packages
install.packages("ISLR")

library("ISLR")


# View summary of carseats
summary(Carseats)


# View amount of rows in dataset
nrow(Carseats)

# Shows the max value of advertising
Max(Carseats$Advertising)


# IQR of price

IQR(Carseats$Price)


# plot of sales vs price

plot(Carseats$Price, Carseats$Sales,
     main = "Sales vs Price",
     xlab = "Price",
     ylab = "Sales",
     col = "Blue", pch = 19)

#correlation between the two attributes

cor(Carseats$Price, Carseats$Sales)
```
